data.quote: Whatever happened, happened for the good. Whatever is happening, is happening for the good. Whatever will happen, will also happen for the good.
data.author: Lord Krishna in Bhagavad Geeta

data.quote: Change is the law of the universe. You can be a millionaire, or a pauper in an instant.
data.author: Lord Krishna in Bhagavad Geeta

data.quote: Man is made by his belief. As he believes, so he is.
data.author: Lord Krishna in Bhagavad Geeta

data.quote: A person can rise through the efforts of his own mind; or draw himself down, in the same manner. Because each person is his own friend or enemy.
data.author: Lord Krishna in Bhagavad Geeta
